name: xtralife-js-client
description: Simple javascript client for Xtralife gaming backend

scripts.compile: browserify -t coffeeify src/index.coffee > ./lib/bundle.js && uglifyjs -c -- lib/bundle.js > lib/bundle.min.js
scripts.prepublish: browserify -t coffeeify src/index.coffee > ./lib/bundle.js && uglifyjs -c -- lib/bundle.js > lib/bundle.min.js

author: chris@xtralife.cloud
